name: Evalground
description: EvalGround(EG) is an online Coding Test hosting and evaluation system focused on helping recruiters in initial screening tests to filter out potential candidates and help the recruiter find their suitable candidates, for suitable job vacancies. Traditional process for recruiting IT developers /programmers can only test their aptitude skills and programming concepts through oral test i.e interview. But EG provides a solution, where the programming skills can be evaluated automatically through coding. Evalground is a platform where you can promote your Brand by adding videos, presentations etc.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: RECRUITMENT MADE EASY
ShortDescription: EvalGround(EG) is an online Coding Test hosting and evaluation system focused on helping recruiters in initial screening tests to filter out potential candidates and help the recruiter find their suitable candidates, for suitable job vacancies.
enhanced_description: Evalground is an online platform specializing in coding test hosting and evaluation, primarily designed for the initial screening of IT developers and programmers. It automates the evaluation of programming skills, providing a more objective assessment than traditional oral interviews. Key features include online test submission, extensive test reports for detailed insights, and debugging code capabilities. The system aims to empower recruiters and hiring managers to identify and hire top talent faster and more efficiently, thereby boosting their confidence and productivity. Additionally, Evalground offers a platform for brand promotion through the inclusion of videos and presentations.
key_use_cases: Filtering potential candidates for job vacancies
Providing extensive test reports for candidate assessment
Promoting brand through multimedia content during recruitment process
competitive_advantages: Automated evaluation of programming skills through coding tests, unlike traditional oral interviews
Provides extensive test reports for in-depth candidate analysis
Includes debugging code capabilities for comprehensive skill assessment
Aids in faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Contributes to boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
implementation_scenarios: Cloud-based/SaaS deployment for online access and test hosting
hr_functions_supported: Talent Management (specifically initial screening and evaluation)
roi_benefits: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Improved candidate filtering during initial screening
Potential reduction in recruiting costs through efficient screening
